devdoc.details: A Smart-contract to store options info.

addExpiration(uint256).details: Implementation of add an eligible expiration into the expirationList.

addOperator(address).details: add a new operator by owner.

addUnderlyingAsset(uint32).details: Implementation of add an eligible underlying into the underlyingAssets.

getBurnedFullPay(uint256,uint256).details: calculate `amount` number of Option's full price when option is burned.

getExpirationList().details: Implementation of getting the eligible expirationList.

getOptionsLimitTimeById(uint256).details: retrieve given `optionsId` option's burned limit timestamp.

getUnderlyingAssets().details: Implementation of getting the eligible underlyingAssets.

getUserOptionsID(address,uint256,uint256.details: retrieve user's `size` number of options' id.

isEligibleExpiration(uint256).details: Implementation of testing whether the input expiration is eligible.

isEligibleUnderlyingAsset(uint32).details: Implementation of testing whether the input underlying is eligible.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeExpirationList(uint256).details: Implementation of revoke an invalid expiration from the expirationList.

removeUnderlyingAssets(uint32).details: Implementation of revoke an invalid underlying from the underlyingAssets.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.timeLimit: set new option's burn time limit.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Options data contract.
